subtitle: Performing reality checks trains the mind to get into the habit of questioning
whether you are dreaming or not ~ try to recall some of your most absurd dreams right now...
perhaps you were having a conversation with a camel while on a roller coaster... now think:
why did you not realize that it was a dream?
you didn't because you haven't trained your mind to tell the difference between waking reality and
dreaming reality... what is absurd is not the dream... what is absurd is our inability to discern when
we're in a ridiculous dream situation that has no correlation with our physical waking life at all
